name: Cow Girls 3 Stories
description:
Only the greenest meadows, only the cleanest ponds, and only the most fragrant flowers on our farm! Any girl cow will feel great here! This means that they will be gentle and give lots of milk! 🐄🐄🐄

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.

FEATURES

  • 🐄 Well-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • 🐄 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🐄 One-handed mode
  • 🐄 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🐄 Relaxing music
  • 🐄 Puzzle game
